channel.title: Type on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in Type on Konigi

item.title: Merry Newsinator
item.description: So this year my company plaid decided to create a tool to help people save time around the holidays. It’s called the Merry Newsinator and it generates a customized personal newsletter in about 3 minutes. Anyways hope you like it and would love to see you post it. I have included one we did for santa claus below! Happy Holidays! http://merrynewsinator.com/2lc

item.title: Bonterra Trattoria
item.description: Mediumrare just launched the redesign of a Calgary Restaurant called Bonterra. Check out the food gallery for pure awesomeness. http://bonterra.ca

item.title: Spark Capital
item.description: jQuery based animations and strong typography http://www.sparkcapital.com
